title: Want to see what League looks like in 4k?
body:
AMD just released new drivers that allow you to play League at 4k then downsample it to 1080P for your monitor.
Look at that shop, lol

http://i.imgur.com/y14ErjI.png

http://i.imgur.com/uNn7tqw.png

http://i.imgur.com/3ydABjz.png

http://i.imgur.com/YS38jgg.png
